name: Grand Theft Auto IV: The Ballad of Gay Tony
name_original: Grand Theft Auto IV: The Ballad of Gay Tony
description:
Grand Theft Auto IV: The Ballad of Gay Tony is an action game developed by Rockstar North. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by Rockstar Games. Grand Theft Auto IV: The Ballad of Gay Tony has a Metascore of 88, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Grand Theft Auto IV: The Ballad of Gay Tony on PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
Leslie Benzies produced the game. Aaron Johnston, Avi Bortnick and Jesse Murphy scored the game.
